thread.title: DISPENSARY 33 BUDTENDERS JOIN TEAMSTERS LOCAL 777 | Nation & World | djournal.com
thread.title_full: DISPENSARY 33 BUDTENDERS JOIN TEAMSTERS LOCAL 777 | Nation & World | djournal.com

author: PR Newswire
title: DISPENSARY 33 BUDTENDERS JOIN TEAMSTERS LOCAL 777 | Nation & World | djournal.com
text:
Union Continues to Expand Presence in Illinois Cannabis Industry
CHICAGO, Aug. 7, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Cannabis workers at Dispensary 33 have overwhelmingly chosen to join Teamsters Local 777.
